[00:00.00]Vamp Anthem (Explicit) - PLAYBOI CARTI
[00:02.59]Lyrics by：Jordan Carter/Kenneth Pannu
[00:05.18]Composed by：Jordan Carter/Kenneth Pannu
[00:07.78]When them vamps outside lil' b***h you better be ready
[00:10.21]When them guns outside lil' b***h you better be ready
[00:13.19]When the stars align lil' b***h you better be ready
[00:16.10]I wanna take my time lil' b***h you know I'm ready
[00:19.01]I want it right now lil' b***h you know I'm ready
[00:21.95]My flag the same color as cranberry
[00:25.13]You come round by my gang it's hail mary
[00:27.88]Them n***as not no thugs they some fairies
[00:31.10]I'm playing with them birds like I'm Larry
[00:33.81]We pop right by the curb they can't tell it
[00:36.93]I'm smoking on the Runtz you can smell it
[00:39.91]This bag I got all orange like a felon
[00:42.71]My b***h she say she want me n***as telling
[00:45.65]We caught him on the block we topped his melon
[00:48.49]We push up to your spot like it's nothing
[00:51.12]Yeah
[00:51.56]Free all the young n***as free young Melvin
[00:54.37]Free all the young n***as free my cousin
[00:57.57]P***y a*s n***as always bluffing
[01:00.48]Pump fake n***a you ain't tough
[01:03.19]I swear to God if I tote that b***h I'ma hit that boy
[01:06.05]I swear to God you play with p***y I don't play with boys
[01:08.99]You come 'round by my gang we gon' let them bullets fly
[01:12.05]I been sipping on c*****e I got pink eyes
[01:14.87]223 gon' hit him up he done got hypnotized
[01:17.64]I done made a mil' in a white tee but I ain't franchise
[01:20.52]These n***as be the new b***hes they just d**kride
[01:23.37]I done called up to the hotel she left me paralyzed
[01:26.27]Vamp anthem vamp anthem
[01:29.32]Vamp anthem vamp anthem
[01:32.22]Vamp anthem vamp anthem yeah
[01:35.11]Vamp anthem vamp anthem yeah
[01:38.23]Vamp uh
[01:39.27]Vamp uh
[01:40.83]Vamp yeah
[01:42.24]Vamp uh
[01:43.75]Vamp uh
[01:45.22]Vamp yeah
[01:46.72]Vamp vamp

[01:51.23]Vamp yeah

data.trans:
[ti:Vamp Anthem (Explicit)]
[ar:PLAYBOI CARTI]
[al:Whole Lotta Red (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.59]//
[00:05.18]//
[00:07.78]当吸血鬼倾巢而出时 小妞 你得做好准备
[00:10.21]当他们掏出枪时 小妞 你得做好准备
[00:13.19]当星辰连成一线时 小妞 你得做好准备
[00:16.10]我想从容不迫 小妞 你知道我蓄势待发
[00:19.01]现在我志在必得 小妞 你知道我蓄势待发
[00:21.95]我的旗帜犹如鲜红的蔓越莓
[00:25.13]你向我的人发起挑衅 你自求多福吧
[00:27.88]这些哥们不是暴徒 他们是精灵
[00:31.10]我玩弄着手里的好货 好像我是Larry一样
[00:33.81]我们在路边扫射 他们看不出来
[00:36.93]我吞云吐雾 你可以闻到气味
[00:39.91]我背着橙色的包 就像是重刑犯
[00:42.71]我的妹子说她需要我 大家议论纷纷
[00:45.65]我们街区把他抓个正着 我们一枪爆头
[00:48.49]我们随心所欲地出入你的地盘
[00:51.12]//
[00:51.56]释放所有年轻人 释放Young Melvin
[00:54.37]释放所有年轻人 释放我的表弟
[00:57.57]怂货总是虚张声势
[01:00.48]装模作样 哥们 你不够强硬
[01:03.19]我对着上帝发誓 如果我动手 我会朝那小子开枪
[01:06.05]我对着上帝发誓 你跟妹子打得火热 我不会跟男孩玩
[01:08.99]你可以来挑衅我的人 我们让子弹横飞
[01:12.05]我一直吸着*** 我的眼睛变成粉色
[01:14.87]0.223口径的子弹打在他身上 他已经动弹不得
[01:17.64]我穿着白色T恤挣了一百万 可我不是Dem Franchize Boyz的成员
[01:20.52]这些哥们都初来乍到 他们只会卖力讨好
[01:23.37]我给酒店打去电话 她让我招架不住
[01:26.27]吸血鬼颂歌 吸血鬼颂歌
[01:29.32]吸血鬼颂歌 吸血鬼颂歌
